title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Online
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Online 
Dissemination of Terrorist Content) (Designation of the Commissioner of An 
Garda Síochána as a Competent Authority) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (online dissemination terrorist content) (designation commissioner garda siochana competent authority) regulation 2025

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations -
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations - 

“Garda Commissioner” means - 

(a) 

(b) 

the person for the time being appointed as the Commissioner of 
An Garda Síochána under section 26 the Policing, Security and 
Community Safety Act 2024 (No.1 of 2024), 

a person to whom the functions of the Commissioner under these 
Regulations stand delegated in accordance with section 39 of that 
Act, or 

(c) 

a person performing the functions of the Commissioner pursuant 
to section 28 of that Act; 

“Regulation (EU) 2021/784” means Regulation (EU) 2021/784 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 29 April 20211 on addressing the dissemination 
of terrorist content online. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and that is also 
used in Regulation (EU) 2021/784 has, unless the context otherwise requires, the 
same meaning in these Regulations as it has in that Regulation. 

(3) A reference in these Regulations to a numbered Article is a reference to 

the Article so numbered of Regulation (EU) 2021/784.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 3. The Garda Commissioner is designated for the purposes of Article
text_raw:
3. The Garda Commissioner is designated for the purposes of Article 
12(1)(b) as the competent authority to scrutinise removal orders pursuant to 
Article 4. 

1 OJ NO. L 172, 17.5.2021, p. 79 
1 OJ NO. L 172, 17.5.2021, p. 79 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st August, 2025.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 4. The Garda Commissioner shall carry out his or her functions as the
text_raw:
4. The Garda Commissioner shall carry out his or her functions as the 
competent authority referred to in Regulation 3 in an objective and nondiscriminatory manner, while fully respecting fundamental rights, and shall be 
independent in the exercise of those functions.
text_norm: 4 garda commissioner shall carry function competent authority referred regulation 3 objective nondiscriminatory manner fully respecting fundamental right shall independent exercise function

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 5. The Garda Commissioner shall, before 1 March each year, in his or her
text_raw:
5. The Garda Commissioner shall, before 1 March each year, in his or her 
capacity as the competent authority referred to in Regulation 3, provide the 
Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration with such information as the 
Commissioner has in that capacity which is required to be forwarded to the 
Commission of the European Union pursuant to Article 21. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 July, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 

Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [375]
